attributes.action: The BBC3 Programme "Our War" Must be Shown on BBC1 at Prime Time
attributes.additional_details:
The BBC3 programme "Our War" must be shown on BBC1 at prime time, so that everyone is aware of that our soldiers are experiencing in Afghanistan.

Hidden away on BBC3 the message is not getting across....

rejection.details: Detailed decisions on programme content and scheduling are matters for the BBC, reflecting its editorial independence. It is a long-standing principle that the Government does not interfere in programme matters, either on arrangements for scheduling or on content.
